attributes.action: Save the Euro and Britain's role in Europe.
attributes.additional_details:
We should support actions to save the Euro, in our own interest and as partners in the EU.
We should join with all other EU nations in adopting the Fiscal Compact they have agreed. We have nothing to fear from its principles or purpose.
We should agree that the Compact can be implemented through EU institutions, and support it being integrated into EU Treaty.
